newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish business climate index rises in June-survey.
newsitem.headline: Polish business climate index rises in June-survey.

text.p: Poland's business climate in the manufacturing sector improved in June after a slight decline in May, a monthly survey of Polish companies by the Central Statistical Office (GUS) showed on Tuesday.

GUS said the business climate index, which represents the difference between the percentage of companies that assess their situation as positive and those with a negative view, rose three points to 12 in June against May.

It said the overall business climate index in the construction sector worsened in June by five points to 43 points. GUS said the retail index fell further in June by four points against May to three points.
